TopicTitle: Kerbalism science only and RO for 1.10?

Articles.Content: I am starting an RO/RSS/RP-1 series, and i am going to use TAC lifesupport. i do however want the kerbalism science functionality. i did find a kerbalism science only config, but it's outdated and it doesn't say that it is RO compatible. so is this possible?
The science-only Kerbalism config is meant for the stock solar system. You could try adding RO-Kerbalism but disabling the life support features, though I suspect it might not work.
